TextView.android:text:
Chess everywhere is a chess app, completely crafted by Nabil Abdelouahed. 

The app allows you to enjoy a good game of chess with a friend without the need for an internet connection or an account. 

You can also use the free mode to let loose of your imagination or simply recreate a position you want to think about. 

You can also have a quick look at some brief information about a few openings.

I hope you enjoy the app !
